If we become aware of prohibited activit: If we become aware of prohibited activity, we may restrict or shutdown the account responsible.
By signing up to use WooCommerce Payment: By signing up to use WooCommerce Payments, you agree not to accept payments in connection with these restricted activities, practices or products. We also work to ensure that no prohibited activity is conducted on WooCommerce Payments.
Social media activity, like Twitter foll: Social media activity, like Twitter followers, Facebook likes, YouTube views

Due to restrictions from card networks,: Due to restrictions from card networks, our payment service providers, and their financial service providers, some businesses and product types that are not allowed to transact using WooCommerce Payments, including but not limited to:
Most banks will reflect the deposit in y: Most banks will reflect the deposit in your account as soon as they receive the transfer from WooCommerce Payments. Some may take a few extra days to make the balance available to you.
For example, a business based in New Zea: For example, a business based in New Zealand has a pending period of 4 business days. Payments made to this account on Wednesday will be paid out on the next Tuesday.
Payments received each day become part o: Payments received each day become part of the pending balance. That pending balance will become available after a pending period. On the day it becomes available, it will be automatically paid out to your bank account. The pending period is based on the country of the account.
For most accounts, <a>WooCommerce Paymen: For most accounts, WooCommerce Payments automatically pays out your available account balance into your nominated account daily after a standard pending period.
1.5% fee on the payout amount for <a>ins: 1.5% fee on the payout amount for instant deposits
To be eligible for this promotional offe: To be eligible for this promotional offer, your store must: (1) meet the WooCommerce Payments usage requirements; (2) be a U.S.-based business; (3) not have processed payments through WooCommerce Payments before; and (4) be accepted into the promotional program.
Stores accepted into the promotional pro: Stores accepted into the promotional program will receive a 100% discount on transaction fees (excluding currency conversion fees) for the first $25,000 in payments, or 3 months, whichever comes first. Simply install the extension and if eligible you’ll be entered into the promotional offer.
How will I save money using WooCommerce: How will I save money using WooCommerce Payments?
Native multi-currency: increase sales by: Native multi-currency: increase sales by making it easier for customers outside your country to purchase from your store, without an extension.
In-person payments: the only payment met: In-person payments: the only payment method that helps you sell online and offline with the official WooCommerce mobile app instead of a paid POS solution.
Native dashboard: track cash flow from t: Native dashboard: track cash flow from the same WordPress dashboard you're already using to manage product catalogue, inventory, orders, fulfilment, and otherwise run your online storefront.
